Exposure_Definition: Using mobile phone >=4 hours per day
Covariates_Adjusted: Age; sex; rural area; paternal education level; family income; overweight; habitual napping; TV/Internet use; chronic medical conditions; perceived study stress; perceived study interest; living expenses
Special_Notes: Depression outcome defined as BDI>=10; primary focus was sleep disturbances with depression as secondary outcome; bidirectional associations examined via cross-lagged analysis
